Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1 RIVERSIDE PLAZA, COLUMBUS, Ohio, 43215-2373, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: American Electric Power is one of the largest regulated utilities in the United States, providing electricity generation, transmission, and distribution to more than 5 million customers in 11 states. About 43% of AEP's of capacity is coal, with the remainder from a mix of natural gas (27%), renewable energy and hydro (19%), nuclear (7%), and demand response (4%). Vertically integrated utilities, transmission and distribution, and generation and marketing support earnings.
